name: ProntoDoc for Excel Conventional Document
summary: Learn about .PDER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Excel with ProntoDoc for Excel plug-in

content: ProntoDoc for Excel, a companion product of ProntoDoc for Word (PDW), is used in business environments for generating reports and other business documents. End users can use the software to generate documents from their local systems using data from small to enterprise-level databases.

description: File used by ProntoDoc for Excel (PDE), a Microsoft Excel plug-in used for generating business documents; stores a document template and includes data that was populated from one or more source databases (SQL Server, SharePoint, and Oracle are supported); used for rendering ProntoDoc for Excel templates (.PDE files) into .XLSX, .PDF and .XPS files; useful in business contexts for automatic report generation.
